name: M16a1 lower receiver
description: A complete M16a1 lower receiver. Any AR platform rifle built with this lower will have both semi-automatic and fully-automatic firemodes.

name: M16a1 upper receiver
description: A complete M16a1 upper receiver. It's not terribly reliable and is prone to fouling farily easily.

name: M16a1 upper receiver 300 blackout
description: A complete M16a1 upper receiver. It's not terribly reliable and is prone to fouling farily easily. This upper is chambered in 300 blackout.

name: M16a2 lower receiver
description: A complete M16a2 lower receiver. Any AR platform rifle built with this lower will have both semi-automatic and burst firemodes.

name: M16a2 upper receiver
description: A complete M16a2 upper receiver. It's more reliable than the M16a1 upper receiver and is build to take more abuse.

name: M16a2 upper receiver 300 blackout
description: A complete M16a2 upper receiver. It's more reliable than the M16a1 upper receiver and is build to take more abuse. This upper is chambered in 300 blackout.

name: M16a3 lower receiver
description: A complete M16a3 lower receiver. Any AR platform rifle built with this lower will have semi-automatic, fully-automatic and burst firemodes.

name: M16a3 upper receiver
description: A complete M16a3 upper receiver. It's more customizeable than any of the previous m16 upper receivers.

name: M16a3 upper receiver 300 blackout
description: A complete M16a3 upper receiver. It's more customizeable than any of the previous m16 upper receivers. This upper is chambered in 300 blackout.

name: ar-15 lower receiver
description: A complete civilian ar-15 lower receiver. Any AR platform rifle built with this lower will only be semi-automatic.
